This partnership aims to provide investors and corporations with comprehensive tools to assess and manage their ESG risks and opportunities.

events.title: Partnership with ABC Investments
events.description: S&P Global announced a strategic partnership with ABC Investments to develop new ESG investment products.

events.title: Acquisition of XYZ Corp
events.description: S&P Global completed the acquisition of XYZ Corp for $2.4B, expanding its data analytics capabilities in the energy sector.

events.title: Completion of Visible Alpha Acquisition
events.description: S&P Global completed its acquisition of Visible Alpha, a financial technology company providing deep consensus data and analytics. The acquisition enhances S&P Global Market Intelligence's data and analytics offerings for its clients.

events.title: Senior Notes Offering
events.description: S&P Global completed a public offering of $500 million of 5.150% senior notes due 2029 and $700 million of 5.350% senior notes due 2034. Proceeds are intended for general corporate purposes, including repayment of commercial paper.

events.title: Partnership with Snowflake
events.description: S&P Global Market Intelligence announced a partnership with Snowflake to deliver its extensive data sets directly to clients through the Snowflake Marketplace, enhancing data accessibility and integration for cloud-based workflows.

events.title: Data Partnership with LSEG
events.description: S&P Global Commodity Insights partnered with London Stock Exchange Group (LSEG) to make its Platts forward curves data for oil, LNG, and other commodities available to customers through the LSEG Workspace platform.

events.title: S&P Global Commodity Insights Partnership with LCH
events.description: S&P Global Commodity Insights partnered with LCH to provide its LNG freight spot price assessments as the settlement basis for new LNG freight futures contracts to be cleared by LCH.

events.title: S&P Global Market Intelligence Partnership with Snowflake
events.description: S&P Global Market Intelligence announced a partnership with Snowflake to deliver its extensive data and analytics via the Snowflake Marketplace, enabling seamless access and integration for clients.

events.title: Senior Notes Offering
events.description: S&P Global priced a multi-tranche public offering of senior notes totaling $3.5 billion, consisting of $700M due 2026, $800M due 2028, $1B due 2033, and $1B due 2053.

events.title: Divestiture of Engineering Solutions Business
events.description: S&P Global completed the sale of its Engineering Solutions business to KKR, a global investment firm. The divestiture was part of the company's portfolio optimization strategy following the IHS Markit merger.

events.title: Acquisition of Visible Alpha
events.description: S&P Global completed its acquisition of Visible Alpha, a financial technology company that provides an investment research technology platform. The acquisition enhances S&P Global Market Intelligence's data and analytics offerings.

events.title: Acquisition of ChartIQ
events.description: S&P Global Market Intelligence completed the acquisition of ChartIQ, a provider of HTML5 charts and data visualization solutions for the financial services industry.

events.title: Collaboration with Singapore Exchange (SGX)
events.description: S&P Global Sustainable1 and Singapore Exchange (SGX) announced a collaboration to enhance sustainability-focused data, indices, and initiatives within the Singapore market.

events.title: Senior Notes Offering
events.description: S&P Global Inc. completed a public offering of several tranches of senior notes totaling $4.5 billion. The proceeds were used for general corporate purposes, including the repayment of debt.

events.title: Divestiture of CUSIP Global Services (CGS)
events.description: As a condition for regulatory approval of the IHS Markit merger, S&P Global completed the sale of its CUSIP Global Services (CGS) business to FactSet.

events.title: Divestiture of Leveraged Commentary and Data (LCD) Business
events.description: S&P Global completed the sale of its Leveraged Commentary and Data (LCD) business, along with a related family of leveraged loan indices, to Morningstar. This divestiture was also a condition for the IHS Markit merger approval.

events.title: Divestiture of OPIS and other IHS Markit businesses
events.description: As part of the merger remedies, IHS Markit completed the sale of its Oil Price Information Services (OPIS), Coal, Metals and Mining, and PetroChem Wire businesses to News Corp.

events.title: Completion of Merger with IHS Markit
events.description: S&P Global completed its all-stock merger with IHS Markit, creating a leading global provider of information, data, and analytics. The merger combined complementary assets in high-growth areas such as ESG, climate, and energy transition.

events.title: Agreement to Divest CUSIP Global Services
events.description: S&P Global entered into a definitive agreement to sell its CUSIP Global Services (CGS) business to FactSet. This divestiture was part of the regulatory approval process for the merger with IHS Markit.

events.title: Agreement to Divest OPIS and Other Businesses
events.description: As a condition for the IHS Markit merger approval, S&P Global and IHS Markit announced a definitive agreement to sell IHS Markit's Oil Price Information Service (OPIS) and related assets to News Corp.

events.title: Senior Notes Offering
events.description: S&P Global announced the pricing of a $13.0 billion offering of senior notes across eight tranches. The net proceeds were intended to fund a portion of the cash consideration for the planned merger with IHS Markit.

events.title: Acquisition of ChartIQ
events.description: S&P Global Market Intelligence completed the acquisition of ChartIQ, a provider of financial charting and data visualization solutions for the capital markets.

events.title: Acquisition of The Climate Service, Inc.
events.description: S&P Global acquired The Climate Service, Inc., a provider of climate risk analytics for corporations, financial institutions and governments. The acquisition enhances S&P Global's ESG and climate-related data offerings.

events.title: Acquisition of Greenwich Associates LLC
events.description: S&P Global completed its acquisition of Greenwich Associates LLC, a leading provider of data, analytics, and insights to the financial services industry. The acquisition was made by S&P Global's subsidiary, CRISIL.
